languages.text: "Кантраэталь, избравший Путь Провидца... Муаран поведал мне, что он исчез сразу, как Крударах постиг катаклизм. Так значит, моих сородичей пленили на вершине шпиля Опустошительной бури? Истина готова раскрыться предо мной, стоит протянуть руку..." {n}Во взгляде Ирлиэт мечутся искры нетерпения. Она желает обратиться к вам, но не решается вмешиваться в разговор с Арлекином.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Кантраэталь, избравший Путь Провидца... Муаран поведал мне, что он исчез сразу, как Крударах постиг катаклизм. Так значит, моих сородичей пленили на вершине шпиля Опустошительной бури? И бутон истины готов раскрыться предо мной, стоит протянуть руку к его измученным лепесткам?" {n}Во взгляде Ирлиэт мечутся искры нетерпения. Она желает обратиться к вам, но не решается вмешиваться в разговор с Арлекином.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Cantraetal, who chose the Path of the Seer... Muaran told me he disappeared as soon as the cataclysm befell Crudarach. Does this mean my kin are being held captive at the top of the Reaving Tempest's spire? The truth is ready to reveal itself to me if I but stretch out my hand..." {n}Sparks of impatience flicker in Yrliet's gaze. She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кантраэталь, избравший Путь Провидца... Муаран поведал мне, что он исчез сразу, как Крударах постиг катаклизм. Так значит, моих сородичей пленили на вершине шпиля Опустошительной бури? Истина готова раскрыться предо мной, стоит протянуть руку..." {n}Во взгляде Ирлиэт мечутся искры нетерпения. Она желает обратиться к вам, но не решается вмешиваться в разговор с Арлекином.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Cantraetal, who chose the Path of the Seer... Muaran told me he disappeared as soon as the cataclysm befell Crudarach. Does this mean my kin are being held captive at the top of the Reaving Tempest's spire? And the bud of truth is ready to unfurl before me, if I but stretch out my hand to its tormented petals?" {n}Sparks of impatience flicker in Yrliet's gaze. She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}

She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}

She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Cantraetal, who chose the Path of the Seer... Muaran told me he disappeared as soon as the cataclysm befell Crudarach. Does this mean my kin are being held captive at the top of the Reaving Tempest's spire? The truth is ready to reveal itself to me if I but stretch out my hand..." {n}Sparks of impatience flicker in Yrliet's gaze. She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “坎特拉塔尔，他选择了先知的道途……穆兰告诉我，说克鲁达拉赫陷落之后，坎特拉塔尔就失踪了。这是不是意味着，我所有的亲族都被囚禁在了狂风阴谋团的尖塔塔顶？真理已经在我面前浮现，我只需要伸出手就可以触碰到它……”{n}伊莉耶特的目光中闪烁着急切的火光。她很想和你谈谈，但她并不打算打断你和丑角的交流。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cantraetal, who chose the Path of the Seer... Muaran told me he disappeared as soon as the cataclysm befell Crudarach. Does this mean my kin are being held captive at the top of the Reaving Tempest's spire? The truth is ready to reveal itself to me if I but stretch out my hand..." {n}Sparks of impatience flicker in Yrliet's gaze. She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “坎特拉塔尔，他选择了先知的道途……穆兰告诉我，说克鲁达拉赫陷落之后，坎特拉塔尔就失踪了。这是不是意味着，我所有的亲族都被囚禁在了狂风阴谋团的尖塔塔顶？真理的花蕾已经在我面前盛开。我只需要伸出手，触摸它饱受摧残的花瓣。是这样吗？”{n}伊莉耶特的目光中闪烁着急切的火光。她很想和你谈谈，但她并不打算打断你和丑角的交流。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Cantraetal, que tomó la Senda del Vidente... Muaran me dijo que desapareció en cuanto el cataclismo llegó a Crudarach. ¿Significa eso que mis hermanos están cautivos en lo alto de la aguja de la Tempestad Asoladora? La verdad está al alcance de mi mano...». {n}Unas chispas de impaciencia crepitan en la mirada de Yrliet. Quiere hablar contigo, pero no tiene intención de interrumpir tu conversación con el Arlequín.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cantraetal, who chose the Path of the Seer... Muaran told me he disappeared as soon as the cataclysm befell Crudarach. Does this mean my kin are being held captive at the top of the Reaving Tempest's spire? The truth is ready to reveal itself to me if I but stretch out my hand..." {n}Sparks of impatience flicker in Yrliet's gaze. She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cantraetal, que tomó la Senda del Vidente... Muaran me dijo que desapareció en cuanto el cataclismo llegó a Crudarach. ¿Significa eso que mis hermanos están cautivos en lo alto de la aguja de la Tempestad Asoladora? ¿Que la semilla de la verdad está lista para brotar ante mí con solo extender la mano hacia sus pétalos atormentados?». {n}Unas chispas de impaciencia crepitan en la mirada de Yrliet. Quiere hablar contigo, pero no tiene intención de interrumpir tu conversación con el Arlequín.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「予言者の道を選んだカントレタル…彼はクルダラに大変異が起こるとすぐに姿を消したとムアランは言っていた。我が仲間はリーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔の最上階に捕らえられているということだろうか？手を伸ばせば、真実はすぐに明らかになるが…」{n}ユリエットの目には焦りが見える。こちらに何か話したがっているようだが、ハーレクィンとのやりとりを邪魔しようとはしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cantraetal, who chose the Path of the Seer... Muaran told me he disappeared as soon as the cataclysm befell Crudarach. Does this mean my kin are being held captive at the top of the Reaving Tempest's spire? The truth is ready to reveal itself to me if I but stretch out my hand..." {n}Sparks of impatience flicker in Yrliet's gaze. She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「予言者の道を選んだカントレタル…彼はクルダラに大変異が起こるとすぐに姿を消したとムアランは言っていた。我が仲間はリーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔の最上階に捕らえられているということだろうか？手を伸ばせば、真実はすぐに明らかになるが…」{n}ユリエットの目には焦りが見える。こちらに何か話したがっているようだが、ハーレクィンとのやりとりを邪魔しようとはしない。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Cantraetal, der den Pfad des Sehers gewählt hat ... Muaran sagte mir, er sei verschwunden, sobald die Katastrophe über Crudarach hereinbrach. Heißt das, dass meine Verwandten auf der Spitze des Turms des plündernden Sturms gefangen gehalten werden? Die Wahrheit ist bereit, sich vor mir zu entfalten, wenn ich nur meine Hand ausstrecke ..." {n}Funken der Ungeduld tanzen in Yrliets Blick. Sie will mit dir sprechen, wird jedoch dein Gespräch mit dem Harlekin nicht unterbrechen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cantraetal, who chose the Path of the Seer... Muaran told me he disappeared as soon as the cataclysm befell Crudarach. Does this mean my kin are being held captive at the top of the Reaving Tempest's spire? The truth is ready to reveal itself to me if I but stretch out my hand..." {n}Sparks of impatience flicker in Yrliet's gaze. She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Cantraetal, der den Pfad des Sehers gewählt hat ... Muaran sagte mir, er sei verschwunden, sobald die Katastrophe über Crudarach hereinbrach. Heißt das, dass meine Verwandten auf der Spitze des Turms des plündernden Sturms gefangen gehalten werden? Und die Blüte der Wahrheit ist bereit, sich vor mir zu entfalten, wenn ich nur meine Hand nach ihren gepeinigten Blättern ausstrecke?" {n}Funken der Ungeduld tanzen in Yrliets Blick. Sie will mit dir sprechen, wird jedoch dein Gespräch mit dem Harlekin nicht unterbrechen.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Cantraetal, qui avait choisi la Voie du Prophète... Muaran m'a dit qu'il avait disparu dès que le cataclysme s'était abattu sur Crudarach. Cela veut dire que mes semblables sont retenus prisonniers au sommet de la tour de la Tempête ravageuse ? La vérité est prête à m'être révélée, il me suffit de tendre la main... » {n}Le regard d'Yrliet brûle d'impatience. Elle souhaite vous parler, mais ne se permettra pas d'interrompre votre discussion avec l'Arlequin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cantraetal, who chose the Path of the Seer... Muaran told me he disappeared as soon as the cataclysm befell Crudarach. Does this mean my kin are being held captive at the top of the Reaving Tempest's spire? The truth is ready to reveal itself to me if I but stretch out my hand..." {n}Sparks of impatience flicker in Yrliet's gaze. She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cantraetal, qui avait choisi la Voie du Prophète... Muaran m'a dit qu'il avait disparu dès que le cataclysme s'était abattu sur Crudarach. Cela veut-il dire que mes semblables sont retenus prisonniers au sommet de la tour de la Tempête ravageuse ? Et que le bourgeon de la vérité est prêt à éclore sous mes yeux, si je tends la main vers ses pétales tourmentés ? » {n}Le regard d'Yrliet brûle d'impatience. Elle souhaite vous parler, mais ne se permettra pas d'interrompre votre discussion avec l'arlequin.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Medyumun Yolu'nu seçen Cantraetal... Crudarach felakete kurban gider gitmez sırra kadem basmış. Muaran öyle demişti. O hâlde soydaşlarım, Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'nin tepesinde tutsak mı? Sanki elimi uzatsam hakikate kavuşacak gibiyim..." {n}Yrliet'in sabırsızlığı, bakışlarına yansıyor. Seninle konuşmak istese de Arleken'le olan konuşmanı bölecek değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cantraetal, who chose the Path of the Seer... Muaran told me he disappeared as soon as the cataclysm befell Crudarach. Does this mean my kin are being held captive at the top of the Reaving Tempest's spire? The truth is ready to reveal itself to me if I but stretch out my hand..." {n}Sparks of impatience flicker in Yrliet's gaze. She wants to talk to you, but she will not interrupt your exchange with the Harlequin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Medyumluk Yolunu seçen Cantraetal... Crudarach felakete kurban gider gitmez sırra kadem basmış; Muaran öyle demişti. O hâlde soydaşlarım, Müfteris Kasırga'nın kulesinin en üstünde tutsak mı? Sanki elimi uzatsam hakikate kavuşacak gibiyim..." {n}Yrliet'in sabırsızlığı bakışlarına yansıyor. Seninle konuşmak istese de, Arleken'le olan konuşmanı bölecek değil.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
